title: Add crypto mining explainer section to the MiningHub PDF
constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI components are read-only).
The requested change ('add what crypto mining is and how it works') already matches an existing implemented feature in the current project; do not create duplicate functionality.
nonGoals: Adding new backend functionality (the backend is currently unused for the PDF generator).
Changing the language of the crypto mining section (it is already present in Hindi; no new translation requested).
Adding new images or changing existing PDF images unless explicitly requested.
